Anzen Kakunin: Kenta to Nyanta no Koutsu: Kenta and Nyanta learn about traffic safety and that even if they're following the law, they still need to be aware of their surroundings for safety in case drivers aren't.
['Hi Asobi wa Kaji no Moto: Kenta to Nyanta no Hi no Youjin', 'Kenta to Nyanta no Kuruma Daisuki!']
